tswitem.name: Signet of Protector's Wrath
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Protector's Wrath
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you heal an ally, you have a 7%/14%/21% chance to also deal 24 damage to enemies within 5 metres of that ally. The damage dealt increases with your Heal Rating. This Signet can be attached to Major Talismans.
